articles.author: Lily Ford
articles.title: Pedro Pascal, Emma Stone on Ari Aster Film 'Eddington' and America - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The movie, set in a small New Mexico town where the local sheriff (Phoenix) decides to run against the COVID-conscious mayor (Pascal), received a muted response at its Friday night premiere.
articles.content:
Ari Aster and his Eddingtoncast are unpacking what the film is saying about America.
The filmmaker was joined by Joaquin Phoenix, Pedro Pascal, Emma Stone, Austin Butler, Micheal Ward and Luke Grime… [+4850 chars]
